comment: /**  * Return the transaction attribute for the given method,  * or {@code null} if the method is non-transactional.  * @param method the method to introspect  * @param targetClass the target class (may be {@code null},  * in which case the declaring class of the method must be used)  * @return the TransactionAttribute the matching transaction attribute,  * or {@code null} if none found  */
code: /**  * Return the transaction attribute for the given method,  * or {@code null} if the method is non-transactional.  * @param method the method to introspect  * @param targetClass the target class (may be {@code null},  * in which case the declaring class of the method must be used)  * @return the TransactionAttribute the matching transaction attribute,  * or {@code null} if none found  */ @Nullable TransactionAttribute getTransactionAttribute(Method method, @Nullable Class<?> targetClass).
